page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE PART 3
page.content: Later my Mum comes to pick me up. We get home and I watch a bit of television. I then unpack my bag, wash out my lunchbox and pack my bag for the next day. After this I play a game of Draughts, Chess or Football. We play until dinner which is usually a cooked meal. After dinner I do my piano and violin practice for 15 minutes each and if I am in a good mood I will do my guitar and recorder practice. After watching a bit of television I have a bath, get into my pyjamas, clean my teeth, get out the annual I started, get into bed, finish the annual, set the alarm clock for the next morning, draw the curtains, turn off the light, get into bed and go to sleep.
